surface_pd.error package

Submodules

surface_pd.error.error module

exception surface_pd.error.error.IncompatibleSymmError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined to show that the user defined symmetric parameter is

not compatible with code determined symmetric parameter.

exception surface_pd.error.error.InvalidCompositionError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the invalid user defined composition list to be enumerated.

exception surface_pd.error.error.InvalidInputFormatError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined to show that the user defined input format is not valid.

exception surface_pd.error.error.InvalidPhasesAlignError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the invalid phases used to calculate the alignment energy.

exception surface_pd.error.error.NoInversionSymmetryError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for not finding the inversion symmetry center.

exception surface_pd.error.error.NonCentralInversionSymmetryError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the slab model which does not have the inversion symmetry center located at the origin.

exception surface_pd.error.error.NonDefinedSelectiveDynamicsError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the slab model that does not have selective dynamics defined for all sites (selective dynamics is extremely useful in several steps).

exception surface_pd.error.error.NonIntegerError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined to check whether the after enumerated number of atoms is an integer with tolerance.

exception surface_pd.error.error.NonPolarSurfaceError(num_layers, num_fixed)

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the non-polar surface.

Parameters:

  • num_layers – Number of layers in the slab model.

  • num_fixed – Number of fixed layers in the slab model.

exception surface_pd.error.error.NonSlabError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the structure that is not a slab model (no enough vacuum region in the model).

exception surface_pd.error.error.PolarSurfaceError(num_layers, num_fixed)

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the polar surface.

Parameters:

  • num_layers – Number of layers in the slab model.

  • num_fixed – Number of fixed layers in the slab model.

exception surface_pd.error.error.PrimitiveStructureFinderError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for wrong refined structure (some sites are lost or redundant).

exception surface_pd.error.error.SlabOrientationError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for wrong slab orientation error.

exception surface_pd.error.error.TooLargeSlabError

Bases: Exception

An error class defined for the too large slab model.

Module contents

SurfacePD error sub-package

This sub-package consists of a following module:

error.py –> Collection of error class defined by developer to guide user.
